# The Maven Objectives

## Logically Explained
* Builds must be simple
  - <img src="https://intellipaat.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Benefits-of-Using-Maven.jpg" alt="Alt text" width="500px" height="desired_height">
* Build must be always uniform
  - <img src="https://preview.redd.it/esqaxwidqkez.jpg?auto=webp&s=48ec6485c9b666a6bb06bec3a89762a122170134" alt="Alt text" width="500px" height="desired_height">
* Emits quality project information
  - <img src="https://whatiscomingtomyhead.wordpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/mavensite.png" width="500px"/>
* Best development practices
  - <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," width="500px"/>
